properties.areaDesc: Tallapoosa, AL; Chambers, AL; Elmore, AL; Randolph, AL; Macon, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 11 at 2:39PM CST until February 12 at 10:00PM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Alabama...

Tallapoosa River At Wadley Affecting Chambers...Elmore...Macon...
Randolph and Tallapoosa Counties.

.Heavy rainfall over the past 2 days has led to significant rises on
portions of the Tallapoosa River. A Flood Warning is now in effect
for the Tallapoosa River at Wadley.

The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Tallapoosa River At Wadley.
* until Wednesday evening...or until the warning is cancelled.
* At  2:00 PM Tuesday The stage Was 13.2 feet.
* Flood stage is 13.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river will continue rising to near 13.4 feet by this
evening. The river will fall below flood stage tomorrow late
morning .
* Impact...At 13.0 feet...Flooding of pasture lands in the area occurs
and cattle and farm equipment should be moved to higher ground if
higher stages are forecast.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Wednesday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
